scripts.install-all: concurrently "cd BlackBoard_Back && npm install" "cd Gerenciador && npm install" "cd Loja_Varejo_1 && npm install" "cd Loja_Varejo_2 && npm install"
scripts.GER-BACK: concurrently "cd Gerenciador && npm run dev" "cd BlackBoard_Back && npm run start"
scripts.LJ1-BACK: concurrently "cd Loja_Varejo_1 && npm run dev" "cd BlackBoard_Back && npm run start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd Gerenciador && npm run dev" "cd Loja_Varejo_1 && npm run dev" "cd Loja_Varejo_2 && npm run dev"  "cd BlackBoard_Back && npm run start"
